name: voraciousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of being very eager to have a lot of something: They ate with the voraciousness of hungry children. Her high intellect and her voraciousness for learning seem wasted. See
voracious
More examplesFewer examplesShe inherited her mother's musical voraciousness.He would ask for food frequently, and eat with great voraciousness.The Pacific has been gobbling up the California coast with growing voraciousness.
